item.title: Backing up kubernetes clusters with Plakar
item.description: We built a Kubernetes integration for Plakar that backs up clusters at three levels: etcd (disaster recovery), manifests (granular restore and inspection), and persistent volumes (via CSI snapshots). This enables full cluster recovery, fine-grained restores, and data portability across environments.

item.title: Storing backups in an OCI registry
item.description: After a podcast discussion, we implemented an OCI registry storage backend. This article discusses the concept and showcases our proof of concept.
